positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: Gopali Youth Welfare Society is a registered voluntary non-governmental organisation run by IIT Kharagpur students along with some faculty members with the support of local members from Gopali.It was established with the objectives of making people aware of problems faced by the modern society.It also aims at helping people's social,economic and cultural development and encouraging them to find out solutions to there problems on the basis of the locally available resources.

experience.title: Summer Internship, Mining Geologist
experience.description: â€¢Managed both Geological and Geotechnical logging, sampling of 12 diamond drill borehole cores for orebody modellingâ€¢Engaged in underground lithostructural mapping for the short term updation of ore body as well as host rock geometryâ€¢Sampled underground production volumes in the stock yard for moisture analysis and managed ore stock for ore quality controlâ€¢Gained exposure in managing the mineral exploration, drilling operations, identifying the rocks and minerals in underground

experience.title: Summer Internship, Geologist

positions.subtitle: Branding and Relations Cell IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: The Branding and Relations Cell (BARC) is a student body committed to positioning and branding IIT Kharagpur as a global leader in the field of research, technology and higher education. We are the bridge between IIT Kharagpur and the target market of the brand which comprises of aspirants and students, faculties in India and abroad, the media that shapes perspective, ranking institutions and governments.
